messages.title: DEMAND CLIMATE ACTION!
messages.content: The climate is breaking down. This is an unparalleled global emergency and climate scientists are clear that we have just a decade left to radically cut emissions.

messages.title: A GREEN VOTE IS URGENT
messages.content: The climate is breaking down. This is an unparalleled global emergency and climate scientists are clear that we have just a decade left to radically cut emissions.

messages.title: THE GREENS HAVE A PLAN
messages.content: Our Scottish Green New Deal would transform the economy, create hundreds of thousands of jobs in green industries, and slash emissions.

messages.title: A GREEN VOTE SENDS A MESSAGE
messages.content: The other parties think that rhetoric and eye-catching targets are enough to get the green vote. They need to see that people demand action.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Transform the economy, create hundreds of thousands of jobs in green industries, and slash emissions.

issues.economy: Our Scottish Green New Deal would transform the economy, create hundreds of thousands of jobs in green industries, and slash emissions.

images.caption: DEMAND CLIMATE ACTION! VOTE SCOTTISH GREENS
